pageProps.title: The Man's Guide to Healing: Navigating the Turbulent Waters of a Breakup
pageProps.metaDesc: Breakups can be incredibly challenging for anyone, but there's a common misconception that they hit men harder than women. The truth is, men often suppress their emotions, making the aftermath of a breakup even more intense. While women may have an influx of options and attention from other men, men are left grappling with the pain and trying to rebuild their lives. In this article, we'll explore the unique struggles men face after a breakup and provide practical advice on how to overcome the emotional turmoil.
